
[TYPE] CODON 1                    //  codon simulation using algorithm from method 1

[SETTINGS]
[fileperrep] TRUE

[MODEL] mMITO    
  [submodel]     7.69208 0.04714  // kappa=7.0, omega=0.2, frequencies different, no indels
  [statefreq]

[MODEL] mNUMT

   [geneticcode] 2
               



/*
  In the same way that lengths of branches are listed after a : symbol in a [TREE]
  block, model names on branches are listed after a # symbol in a [BRANCHES] block. 
  N.B. The structure of the tree & order of taxa is the same (see notes at end of file).
*/

[TREE]     t1 ( (SA:1.0, SB:1.0):1.0,(SC:1.0, SD:1.0):1.0);  

[BRANCHES] b1 ( (SA #mMITO, SB#mMITO) #mMITO,(SC #mNUMT, SD #mNUMT) #mMITO)#mMITO;  

          
  /* [BRANCHES] blocks are included in [PARTITIONS] blocks in the same way as models */

[PARTITIONS] Pname  [t1 b1 150]    // tree t1, branchclass b1, root length 1000

[EVOLVE]     Pname  100  SIMU1  // 10 replicates generated from partition Pname
